entry.data:
SUNNY, BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
WEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
